title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press Ok, I receive the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, it creates an illegal state.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Go to settings
3. Navigate to the classpath / output location section
4. Set the output location and classpath at the same time
5. Press Ok
